title: Cystine crystal nucleation and decay in the context of cystinuria pathogenesis and treatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32063-32072
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04469J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kimberley Noble, Oisín N. Kavanagh
We examine cystine crystal growth and decay in cystinuria. We identify the conditions which can reproduce classical hexagonal cystine crystals and highlight an unusual dissolution pattern.
